object.name: MK 17 SCAR-H
object.description: The SCAR is a modular rifle made by FNH for the United States Special Operations Command to satisfy the requirements of the SCAR competition. The SCAR-H, aka MK17, is designed to fire more powerful cartridge than its alternative version the SCAR-L.

object.name: Standard Long Barrel
object.description: The Standard Long Barrel designed for longer-range engagements.

object.name: 20-Round Box Magazine
object.description: The 20-Round Box Magazine is a newly designed 20-round magazine widely equipped by the SCAR-H and the SSR which carries the 7.62x51mm NATO cartridge.

object.name: 3x-9x Duplex Cross-hair Sniper Rifle Scope
object.description: The 3x-9x Rifle Scope offers more flexibility regarding shooting at varying ranges, targets and light conditions and provides a variable magnification from 3x to 9x.

object.name: Standard Sniper Support
object.description: The Standard Sniper Support offers improved accuracy when firing from a supported position.
